title: Out of range?
body:
So I just opened a game like i always would in the morning and the game updated which i thought was no big deal but now , all of the sudden the  game just says out of range when i am in full screen but the resolution is perfectly set and i don't know why it says that, so as a result i can not be full screen so it is not as enjoyable 
How might i be able to fix this?

replies.body: Thank you , I changed the game to Border-less  and it now works just fine

Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/VJeqP4UK-fullscreen-issueout-of-range-issue) and a fix is in the works, however for now you can try some of the workarounds provided in the linked thread, let me know if anything helps.
